actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: Requesting that the Secretary of the Interior withdraw proposed regulations concerning rights-of-way granted under section 2477 of the Revised Statutes.

summary.text: Requests the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) withdraw certain proposed regulations regarding rights-of-way granted under specified Federal law; and (2) reissue such proposed regulations for public comment only after they have been redrafted to reflect and comply with all pertinent laws, directives, and precedents.

titles.title: Requesting that the Secretary of the Interior withdraw proposed regulations concerning rights-of-way granted under section 2477 of the Revised Statutes.
